eu.opends.trigger

Class SendMessageTriggerAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.opends.trigger.TriggerAction
      • eu.opends.trigger.SendMessageTriggerAction

  • public class SendMessageTriggerAction
extends TriggerAction
    This class represents a SendMessage trigger action. Whenever a collision with a related trigger was detected, a specified message will be displayed on the simulator screen for the given number of seconds.
    Author:
    Rafael Math

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SendMessageTriggerAction(float delay, int maxRepeat, java.lang.String message, int duration)
      Creates a new SendMessage trigger action instance, providing message text and duration.

    • Method Summary

      • SendMessageTriggerAction

                        int maxRepeat,
                        java.lang.String message,
                        int duration)
        Creates a new SendMessage trigger action instance, providing message text and duration.
        Parameters:
        message - Message text which will be displayed on trigger collision.
        duration - Number of seconds the message will be displayed.
